bibl.title: The Honorary Decree for Simon the Maccabee (1Macc. 14:25-49) in Its Hellenistic Context.
Hellenism in the Land of Israel
bibl.author: VAN HENTEN, Jan Willem

bibl.note: Analyse la structure et le contenu d'inscriptions ptolémaïques proches du décret que mentionne 1Macc. 14, 25-49: O.G.I.S. I, 56 (= I. Prose 8-10); - 90 (= I. Prose 16-18); - S.E.G. VIII 504 et 467 (= I. Prose 12-14).
VAN HENTEN Jan Willem, The Honorary Decree for Simon the Maccabee (1Macc. 14:25-49) in Its Hellenistic Context.
John J. COLLINS and Gregory E. STERLING (Edd.), Hellenism in the Land of Israel (Notre Dame, IN, 2001) pp. 116-145.
